entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:20 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
